summary: Geraldo Rivera  is an American attorney, journalist, author, reporter, and talk show host.
full_text: Gerald Michael Rivera , better known as Geraldo Rivera , is an American attorney, reporter, author, and talk show host. He was the host of the talk show Geraldo from 1987 to 1998. Rivera currently hosts the newsmagazine program Geraldo at Large and appears regularly on Fox News Channel programs such as The Five.
title: Geraldo Rivera
